## âœ… Quality Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] No duplicate entries (checked with `sort file.txt | uniq -d`)
- [ ] No trailing spaces (checked with `grep -n ' $' file.txt`)
- [ ] Proper line endings (Unix LF, not Windows CRLF)
- [ ] Alphabetically sorted (where applicable)
- [ ] One entry per line
- [ ] No empty lines
- [ ] Only ASCII characters (or justified non-ASCII)

### Documentation
- [ ] README.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if applicable)
- [ ] New files documented in README
- [ ] Count statistics are accurate

### Safety & Ethics
- [ ] No malicious or destructive payloads
- [ ] No DoS-causing payloads
- [ ] No actual credentials or sensitive data
- [ ] Payloads are for enumeration/detection only
- [ ] Follows responsible disclosure practices

## ğŸ”’ Legal & Ethical Compliance

### Authorization
- [ ] All payloads were discovered during **authorized** testing
- [ ] I have permission to share these findings
- [ ] No sensitive or proprietary information included
- [ ] Follows responsible disclosure timeline

### Ethical Guidelines
- [ ] I have read and understood the project's ethical guidelines
- [ ] These payloads will be used for legitimate security testing
- [ ] I understand the legal implications of misuse
- [ ] This contribution follows all applicable laws
